snippet.title: Piko Interactive Collection 1 - Evercade Cartridge Tour
snippet.description:
Captured directly off the Evercade VS.

Games:
00:00:08 - 8 Eyes (NES)
00:03:40 - Brave Battle Saga: Legend of the Magic Warrior (MegaDrive / Genesis) [Official English translation]
00:35:14 - Canon: Legend of the New Gods (MegaDrive / Genesis) [Official English translation]
00:49:11 - Dorke & Ymp (SNES) [Previously unreleased game]
01:00:13 - Dragon View (SNES)
01:10:14 - Drakkhen (SNES)
01:16:23 - Iron Commando (SNES)
01:24:52 - Jim Power in The Lost Dimension (SNES)
01:27:39 - Magic Girl featuring Ling Ling the Little Witch (MegaDrive / Genesis) [Official English translation]
01:32:43 - Nightshade (NES)
01:42:10 - Power Piggs of the Dark Ages (SNES)
01:45:43 - Power Punch II (NES)
01:51:26 - Radical Rex (MegaDrive / Genesis)
01:56:58 - Switchblade (MegaDrive / Genesis) [This is a port made from ground up in 2018]
02:05:47 - The Humans (SNES)
02:12:12 - The Immortal (MegaDrive / Genesis)
02:17:16 - The Way of the Exploding Fist (NES)
02:19:12 - Tinhead (MegaDrive / Genesis)
02:26:51 - Top Racer (SNES) [Also known as Top Gear, which is not to be confused with the BBC show with the same name]
02:29:01 - Water Margin: A Tale of Clouds and Wind (MegaDrive / Genesis) [Official English translation]
